headline: Should Newtyn’s Stake And T‑Mobile Lease Shift Array Digital Infrastructure’s (AD) Investment Narrative?
summary: Newtyn Management recently disclosed a new US$67.5 million position in Array Digital Infrastructure, acquiring 1.35 million shares and making the stock the fund’s fourth-largest holding as the company completes its shift from a wireless operator to a pure tower business. This investment coincides with Array Digital Infrastructure’s 83% year-on-year third-quarter operating revenue increase, driven by a new long-term master lease agreement that has significantly lifted site-rental income from...
